name: Diving for Dinner
description:
Diving for Dinner

This game was made for Ludum Dare 48 (Jam) with the theme "Deeper and Deeper".

Dive down to the depths of Antarctica to catch fish, but don't get eaten by the dangerous predators, all waiting to munch on some delicious penguin.

Controls:
  • Swimming: Mouse (left and right click), Gamepad or WASD+Space
  • Menu: Esc
  • Fullscreen: F11
Used development tools:
  • Engine: Godot 3.3
  • Art: Krita
  • Sound: Audacity
  • Music: LMMS
